author: _shemnon
content: Hedera works with sequential numbers.  The biggest issue is needing to know the address a-priori or to coordinate the number.  For example if an exchange sends to a new account how do you communicate it?  This is a proposal in-process to allow for an alias for a few key operations (account creation and account query) - https://hips.hedera.com/hip/hip-32

author: _shemnon
content: So there is still a mapping, but it is limited to the address and the alias only.
